long_description: Don't sweat the uphills. A ventilating center-back panel on the men's Canari Klipspringer Bike Jersey helps you keep your cool. Soft, lightweight polyester fabric excels at wicking moisture and is highly breathable. Nylon/spandex venting panel in back helps regulate your core temperature. Offers UPF 30 sun protection; tall collar also helps protect neck from excess sun. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Canari Klipspringer Bike Jersey features a triple back pocket.
short_description: Don't sweat the uphills. A ventilating center-back panel on the men's Canari Klipspringer Bike Jersey helps you keep your cool.
